meanings.sent1: The fortuned meeting with an old friend made her day.
meanings.sent2: She felt fortuned to find a four-leaf clover in the garden.
meanings.sent3: The fortuned arrival of the pizza delivery guy saved the party.
meanings.sent4: The fortuned timing of the rain cooled down the scorching day.
meanings.sent5: The fortuned discovery of a lost wallet brought a smile to her face.

meanings.definition: Provided with a fortune or wealth.
meanings.sent1: The fortuned prince lived in a grand castle.
meanings.sent2: She inherited a fortuned estate from her late uncle.
meanings.sent3: The fortuned businessman owned a fleet of luxury cars.
meanings.sent4: The fortuned family donated generously to charity.
meanings.sent5: The fortuned heiress traveled the world in style.
